alert.note: Alert for Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 12:01AM EDT until March 13 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze up to one-tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Mineral Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 2 AM EDT Monday. Light snow will likely overspread the area Sunday morning from southwest to northeast between 10 AM and noon Sunday. Light snow will likely mix with light freezing rain and freezing drizzle late Sunday afternoon into Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
